explains: adj. 奇妙的；令人惊奇的；非常的

sentences.en: We were driven across this wondrous vast land of lakes and forests.
sentences.cn: 我们乘车穿越了这片有湖泊和森林的广袤而神奇的土地。

sentences.en: The king, however, had a lion which was a wondrous animal, for he knew all concealed and secret things.
sentences.cn: 但是，国王有一头狮子，它是一只神奇的动物，能识破一切伪装的事物。
